meta.title: PharmaB2B | The Future of Pharmacy Supply

hero.title: Powering the Next Generation of Pharmacy Supply
hero.description: The all-in-one Shahi Pharma marketplace connecting pharmacies directly to suppliers. Streamline orders, track inventory, and grow your business with Shahi Pharma.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Order today and get your supplies delivered within 24 hours. We prioritize speed so you never run out of stock.

verifiedQuality.title: Verified Quality
verifiedQuality.description: All medicines are sourced from certified manufacturers. We guarantee 100% authentic products for your customers.

trackGrowth.title: Track Growth
trackGrowth.description: Use our advanced dashboard to track your order history, spending, and inventory levels in real-time.
